Classes Dance

An exquisite show for you and those with whom you share the celebration. Two or three graceful dancers will mesmerize you and your guests with the following performances:
Belly Dance Classes
Learn more

Feel the lightness, flexibility, and new possibilities of the body through the training of belly dance. In addition to moving beautifully and feeling the music, you will improve circulation, metabolism, pelvic health, and many other indicators that affect the quality of life.

Learn only from the best ones. As a winner and medalist of world-class dance competitions and an experienced dance instructor, Anastasia will beсome your guide to the world of dance.

Age, gender, and level of training do not matter. Let the elegance of dance into your life in a private class:

Time: by appointment
Price: $150/h

or join the group classes:

Time: Tuesday / Thursday 7 pm
$75 for 5 class package
(6 weeks to use)
$20 drop-in
Ballet Classes
Learn more

Ballet is an art for the select few and you as well! The flying movements of classical choreography are adapted for different groups, depending on age and skill.

Entrust your first steps in the art of ballet to a qualified instructor. Higher choreographic education in St. Petersburg State University of Culture and Arts, advanced training at masterclasses in the U.S., and experience in staging dance for international events let Marina teach gently and productively.

Improve your posture and figure through a combination of stretching and aerobic exercise. The Ballet Mistress invites you to discover the world of pure grace.

Private classes:

Time: by appointment
Price: $150/h

Group classes:

Time: Tuesday / Thursday 7 pm
$75 for 5 class package
(6 weeks to use)
$20 drop-in
